remarks: The remainder has a degree smaller than the divisor.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
r1pval.e $e |- E = ( rem1p ` R ) $.
r1pval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
r1pval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
r1pcl.c $e |- C = ( Unic1p ` R ) $.
r1pdeglt.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
r1pdeglt $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. C ) -> ( D ` ( F E G ) ) < ( D ` G ) ) $.
